titles.title: Homeless Women Veterans and Homeless Veterans with Children Reintegration Grant Act of 2009

To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Labor to carry out a grant program to provide reintegration services through programs and facilities that emphasize services for homeless women veterans and homeless veterans with children.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E41-42)
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
